file_content.text: I don't suppose you know a pirate crew that's hiring?
We'll be waiting for your orders, Captain.
Whoa! Lay off...! Stop shooting!
If Shai Tenna's not cracking the whip, we've got no call to fight you. The White Maw cut us loose.
And it looks like the lady isn't so keen on keeping up the attack.
So, where to next, boss?
Where...? Is he talking to me?
Forget these pirates. Come with me and start a new life.
[Flirt] The Republic awaits.
Would I be a fool if I closed my eyes and said "take me away from all this"?
Yes.
You keep doing what you're good at. Just bring the profits to Darmas Pollaran at Port Nowhere.
I'm the new pirate lord, boys.
Aye-aye, Captain.
But what about Trick? The Republic sent you to find the White Maw's secret, right?
With a war to win, they're going to use him just like Shai Tenna did.
There's a lot I'll do for money, but I draw the line at torture.
I won't let that happen.
I won't lie. His talent's too valuable to waste. But think how many others he'll be saving from slavery.
He could save millions.
Do you really think I'd do anything to hurt you?
[Flirt] Do you trust me?
When Shai Tenna took me to Hoth... I never thought I'd be warm again.
I'll bring Trick to the Republic base. Don't make me wait too long.
He's going to the Republic. Your only choice is if you want to go with him.
Not my problem. I made a deal.
Fine, I'll take him to the base. Better to go with me than a stranger.
We'll meet you there.
I, uh, think this means we're on our own, guys.
Are you ready to be my pirate queen?
[Flirt] We'll be a great team.
In the "vassal nation paying tribute" sort of sense.
You make it sound like so much fun. I just don't know if....
Show me you can run this crew, I'll set up buyers all over the galaxy... for a small percentage.
You can all work for me.
But... I don't know if I....
The tibanna mine ships on Bespin. We'll hit them like we planned. Ready the fleet, blasters at the go. Say! That was easy!
You heard the lady! Get marching!
Conventional shields only. As long as I'm in charge, Trick is off-limits.
Trick is what made the White Maw invincible.
We need him.
And without him, we're... us. I know you're right, I just don't want to see him in pain.
But maybe... I can balance it. Give him time to recover. If he understood, he'd want to help me.
I hear about anyone messing with the boy, you'll answer to me.
Listen to the lady.
I don't know how to thank you, Captain.
But I can probably come up with something.
I wasn't sure you'd really let me say that. Most people can't turn away from the kind of power Trick can give.
Come on, boys. Let's show the captain what we can do.
Come to the Republic. Put the White Maw behind you.
Ignore him. Join the Republic.
I want to trust you....
She's not in charge.
Fine. [Shoot Alilia.]
Aaaaah!
Uh, yeah, sure. Whatever you say, boss. Grab the kid, boys. Let's go!
What about me and Trick? What happens to us?
You could run this crew--as long as my percentage arrives intact.
Can you take orders?
Sorry. It's a choice between freeing the kid and freeing my credits.
Forget Trick. He's mine.
You can't just take him! I'm all he has!
Don't worry, little buddy. I'll get you back to the Republic base.
I will escort the cargo back.
I will take him.
You need me to take him somewhere, boss?
There's a lot more galaxy out there.
[Flirt] Come back with me.
What do you think about working under me?
[Flirt] You can run this crew.
I've been thinking about it... a lot. I'll take any position you have for me.
You cannot seriously expect me to listen to this.
Subtle, guys.
Oh, I don't think so! Leave the bimbo, take the kid, and we're out of here. Right?
Maybe you two just need to get to know each other....
You don't like her?
I didn't realize you guys were... men never change, do they?
Not without pliers and a blowtorch.
I'll just bring Trick to the Republic base, then. The, uh, offer of sanctuary is still good, right?
Of course. I'm sure the Republic will have great use for both of you... somewhere very far away.
Uh, of course. Grab the boy. I was just saying goodbye.
Yes, dear.
Come here, kid. I'll get you to the base safely.
Trick! Trick!
No! You can't take him from me!
You'll regret this! You may not think I've got it in me to lead the White Maw, but you're wrong!
I'll put together my own crew, and I will find you!
This is who I am, darling. You can't turn a nexu into a house cat.
Don't tell me what to do.
Someone needs a trip to the vet.
This is the way you want to go, count me out.
And you can just march right along with them.
Talk loud, insult their mothers and only cry if it puts them off guard. Best way to manage men.
Those are Republic mining ships, Captain. Are you sure we should be doing this?
The cat grows claws.
She does well.
Help us....
Come on, Trick my boy. We're going for a little ride in the starship....
Starship, mama? Trick?
Boys, take Trick to the ship. The captain and I need a planning session, in private....
When I am cold, dead and buried!
Put the little tart in charge if you must, but I'd better not catch you taking anything more than a percentage from her.
I never said you couldn't join us....
Lighten up.
Look, you two obviously have something going on here.
Just tell me where to bring the profits, okay?
Just bring any profits to Darmas Pollaran at Port Nowhere.
I'm spoken for.
Um, yeah. Of course.
Don't worry. You won't ever have to see me again.
Don't fall in love with a nexu, then hope for a house cat, darling.
This is who I am.
Fine! Next time you want to snuggle, ask the Wookiee!
Where were we?
I guess "get a room" is a bit redundant.
I don't know how you do it, Captain.
Your priorities continue to mystify me.
I'll go... watch the ice....
Mmmph.
Is this what I can expect every time I bring an irreplaceable talent to your empire?
I'll be back here as often as I can, sweetheart.
Every time.
I've got a tight schedule, but I might drop in to surprise you.
You never know.
I'll see you on Port Nowhere, Captain. Keep a room for me.
You can send my percentage to Port Nowhere. Don't expect to see me again.
Goodbye.
Just tell me where to bring the haul.
Get to the pirating, already!
